clumpy.utils.ndarray_suitable_integer_type¶

clumpy.utils.ndarray_suitable_integer_type(a)[source]¶

Convert a ndarray in a suitable integer type

Parameters

a (ndarray) – numpy array to convert.

Returns

a_converted – The numpy array converted (it’s a copy’)

Return type

ndarray
